metadata.title: A Correct by Construction Approach for the Modeling and the Verification of Cyber-Physical Systems in Event-B

body_text.text: As future work, we plan to integrate Mathematica [15], a symbolic mathematical computation system that resolves differential equations, as a back-end tool in the Rodin platform to resolve differential equations. We also plan to define a refinement of the Time-Triggered model to take into account duration between the sending of continuous measurements by sensors and their processing by the controller as well as duration between the sending of actions by the controller and their execution in order to get a model that corresponds better to real CPSs, and consequently implements this concrete model.
